jd: From: Praveen Kumar, Magicforce praveen@magicforce.us Reply to: praveen@magicforce.us Job Title: Business Analyst Location: Remote Duration: 1+ Year 12+EXP MUST Mandatory skills; Data Mapping RATE $50/HR ON C2C Job Description: Responsibilities: -Bachelor’s Degree or additional years of experience in lieu of degree 3-5 years of experience as an analyst Experience in leading Projects Experience source-to-target mapping of data Analysis of business problems/needs Excellent written & verbal communication skills Must be able to work independently and as part of a team Must have analytical skills Proficiency in technical skills and communication Experience with Optum software preferred Experience with Google Cloud Platform preferred Experience in Healthcare or Health Insurance Industry preferred Educational Qualifications: -Engineering Degree – BE/ME/BTech/MTech/BSc/MSc. Technical certification in multiple technologies is desirable
